name: com.gamelovers.gamedata
author: Miguel Tomas
description: Core data utilities and configuration management for Unity games. Includes observable data types (fields, lists, dictionaries), deterministic floats (floatP), serialization helpers, type-safe config storage, versioning, and backend sync support.

samples.description: ObservableField + ObservableList + ComputedField with both uGUI and UI Toolkit bindings
ScriptableObject editing workflow using ConfigsScriptableObject, UnitySerializedDictionary, and EnumSelector
Editor-only demo for validation attributes (EditorConfigValidator) and schema migrations (MigrationRunner)
